## Profile {.hp-title}
CBM-STS · Silicon sensor inspection · Image processing {.hp-sub}

Currently, I am working on the silicon microstrip detector for the **Compressed Baryonic Matter (CBM)** experiment.  
My work involves optical inspection and characterization of silicon sensors. I also develop image-processing methods to locate defects such as implant breaks, open passivation, dust contamination, and damaged AC/DC pads.

I specialize in transforming complex datasets into **reliable, actionable insights** through reproducible workflows developed within international collaborations such as **CBM/FAIR**, **GSI Helmholtz Centre**, and **Goethe University Frankfurt**.
:::
